text: With or Without You is a 1999 British romantic drama film directed by Michael Winterbottom and starring Christopher Eccleston and Dervla Kirwan. Set in Belfast, it tells the story of a married couple trying to have children. Their efforts are interrupted when past loves re-enter their lives. ==External links== * Category:1999 romantic drama films Category:1999 films Category:Film4 Productions films Category:British romantic drama films Category:British films Category:1999 drama films
title: With or Without You (1999 film)
